name: earn-100000-points-intro-offer
content:
<?xml version="1.0"?>

<root available-locales="en_US" default-locale="en_US" version="1.0">
	<dynamic-element field-reference="Text81265758" index-type="keyword" instance-id="ZDTccnH8" name="Text81265758" type="text">
		<dynamic-content language-id="en_US"><![CDATA[Earn 100,000 points intro offer]]></dynamic-content>
	</dynamic-element>
	<dynamic-element field-reference="Image53931646" index-type="text" instance-id="OpC1PN6d" name="Image53931646" type="image">
		<dynamic-content language-id="en_US"><![CDATA[{"groupId":"33467","alt":"","name":"earn.svg","width":"390","description":"","title":"earn","type":"document","uuid":"d16bddcb-d203-2a16-1d86-540d6bb87b88","fileEntryId":"34620","resourcePrimKey":"34666","url":"/documents/d/pillar/earn","height":"260"}]]></dynamic-content>
	</dynamic-element>
	<dynamic-element field-reference="Text40518169" index-type="keyword" instance-id="LiZ4pZ0O" name="Text40518169" type="text">
		<dynamic-content language-id="en_US"><![CDATA[Open a Pillar Premier card and get 100,000 points if you spend $4,000 in the first 3 months. That’s $1,250!²]]></dynamic-content>
	</dynamic-element>
</root>
